title: Explaining COVID and the Vaccine to those with Learning Disabilities and Autism | Healthwatch Swindon
author: Advice; Information
description: Are you or someone you know looking for Easy Read information to explain our current situation with COVID, vaccines, and Lockdown? If so, we have collated the latest documents, films, and audio to help explain and reassure you and your loved ones.
cleaned_text: Explaining COVID and the Vaccine to those with Learning Disabilities and Autism [Keep Safe UK](https://www.keepsafe.org.uk/) has produced a selection of Easy Read information on COVID, Lockdown, the COVID vaccine, and getting ill; [Keeping Safe](https://www.keepsafe.org.uk/posters/keeping-safe)(Explains COVID prevention and how not to spread it) [Back in lockdown](https://www.keepsafe.org.uk/posters/back-in-lockdown)(What you can and cannot do in Lockdown) [Who gets the COVID vaccine first](https://www.keepsafe.org.uk/posters/back-in-lockdown) [COVID vaccine - please don't call the NHS will contact you](https://www.keepsafe.org.uk/posters/please-dont-call-us) [How to get a COVID test](https://www.keepsafe.org.uk/posters/how-to-get-a-test) [The NHS is everyone who needs it](https://www.keepsafe.org.uk/posters/the-nhs-is-open) Support Bubbl](https://www.keepsafe.org.uk/posters/support-bubble) [es](http://www.keepsafe.org.uk/posters/support-bubble) NHS England has developed a [film for people with learning disabilities and/or autistic people about vaccination](https://eur02.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flnks.gd%2Fl%2FeyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJidWxsZXRpbl9saW5rX2lkIjoxMjAsInVyaSI6ImJwMjpjbGljayIsImJ1bGxldGluX2lkIjoiMjAyMTAxMTUuMzM0MDg4OTEiLCJ1cmwiOiJodHRwczovL3lvdXR1LmJlL00zV2gyM1BEbmZFIn0.VM50pcVKZDiDoLASXISyv3Po5SsKIsu27bTVau4kgog%2Fs%2F593465266%2Fbr%2F93191631734-l&data=04%7C01%7Ccharlotte.thomas%40wiltshire.gov.uk%7Ca5fb06108fb6422f15ec08d8bc5f8572%7C5546e75e3be14813b0ff26651ea2fe19%7C0%7C0%7C637466465749195552%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000&sdata=3IVrVOgQUxXKk3m8%2Fy71Lsb04kk1qbArSi20NIxI1Z4%3D&reserved=0). It describes what a vaccine is, how vaccines are made, why you should get a vaccine, whether a vaccine makes you ill and how to decide whether to have a vaccine. Downloads If you would like more detailed Easy Read information on the COVID-19 vaccination or the National Lockdown, the NHS has produced these leaflets with the latest information. Other forms of accessible COVID-19 information and activities can be found on [Storicise](https://www.storicise.com/) a website developed by the Department of Health and Social Care to help children better understand COVID-19 featuring TV doctors, Dr. Chris and Dr. Xand Van Tulleken.
